title.narrative: LOCAL GOVERNANCE

description.narrative: Local authorities in target areas have adopted child-friendly strategies, improved knowledge of the situation of children and enhanced capacity to design and deliver integrated and equitable supply of services., which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Climate Change, Disaster Risks And Envionmental Degradation, Climate Change, Disaster Risks And Envionmental Degradation (Covid), Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Public Finance And Local Governance, Reducing Child Poverty, Reducing Child Poverty (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, child-related national policies, budgets and systems, including the child protection system, are inclusive and equity- focused.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Local authorities in target areas have adopted child-friendly strategies, improved knowledge of the situation of children andenhanced capacity to design and deliver integrated and equitable supply of services.

description.narrative: UNICEF Mongolia’s advocacy and technical support strengthened the capacities of sub-national government in child friendly planning and budgeting with a special focus on ensuring sustainability of implementation ofChild friendly CommunitiesInitiatives(CFCI) programme infive; geographic focus areas (GFAs). GFAs have progressively worked towards ensuring the sustainability of implementation of CFCIin their provinces. This has resulted in development of sustainability action plan on CFCI to be implemented with their own resources.Despite the economic challenges due to COVID-19,local governments maintained the spending for children from Local Development Fund at 2 | Status:On-track | As-of Date:23/12/2021
